name: Wizz Bizz
description:
Made as part of Abertay Games Development Society Jam 2017.

The older your wizard, the more powerful you are. Cast your spells to de-age your opponent until they turn into a baby.

Requires a single Xbox controller and at least 2 players!

Each analogue stick controls a player.

Each bumper button makes a player jump.

Holding down trigger will begin casting a spell for a player, the analogue stick will control the direction of the cast. Upon releasing the trigger the spell will be unleashed.
